name: The game developer
description:
In this game, you are a game developer, participate in a game jam, now your goals is try to get some good ratings!

Press space for programming, d for drawing.

Press for points, higher points give you higher ratings.

Press the t for thinking, there is an idea button, click it when it show "Got an idea".

Credit to Slicin#2924 on Discord for the art!
